message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $100 for it. Would you consider this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $150 is my bottom line.  I know the value this product offers and I'm confident you won't be disappointed.
